snippet: The Presidio Trust’s board voted Monday against Mr. Lucas’s plan and two others for an eight-acre site that has been leased to a sports retailer, the Sports Basement, since 2004.
abstract: Presidio Trust, stewards of national park land at base of Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco, rejects museum proposal by George Lucas, producer and creator of Star Wars films; Lucas wants showcase for his collection of popular art and had pledged $700 million to build and endow it.
lead_paragraph: The Presidio Trust’s board voted Monday against Mr. Lucas’s plan and two others for an eight-acre site that has been leased to a sports retailer, the Sports Basement, since 2004.

headline.main: California: Proposal for Lucas Museum Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: California: Proposal for Lucas Museum Is Rejected
